name: Split An Atom
description:
Split An Atom is a multiple award-winning integrated marketing agency with digital, content, and public relations at the forefront of all our work. We provide companies and individuals with the best service possible.
We work with companies of all sizes, from bootstrapped start-ups to Fortune 500 companies. We work with government and healthcare, globally. We also work with tradesmen and creators, including music artists, YouTubers, streamers, and photographers.
Are you looking to start a new business, or give your current one a facelift? Unsure how monetise your existing audience? Not sure how to deal with the demands of the constantly changing ways to stay in touch with your customers? Concerned about potential revenue streams not being explored? Need someone that can provide you with the brilliant marketing that your new product or service deserves?
Your search is over. Welcome to Split An Atom.
